$comment: description about this dataset with another data on the web, as they are listed on DataCite (metadata schema 4.3). cf. [https://doi.org/10.14454/7xq3-zf69]. e.g. IsCitedBy --> is-cited-by. The XML schema definition may be found at [http://schema.datacite.org/meta/kernel-4.3/metadata.xsd], and the XML namespace is [http://datacite.org/schema/kernel-4] e.g. [http://datacite.org/schema/kernel-4#relatedIdentifier]
